project.name: arctic
project.description: Lightweight GUI framework for haXe targetting Flash 7, 8 and Flash 9
project.version: - added selectable parameter to Text block to make text selectable - you can now specify width or height as null for a textinput, and it will resize itself dynamically when text changes - Fix wrong sizing behaviour of the new Align block - Add a funky DebugBlock block which helps debug trouble with wrong layouts
